title: Ivanka Trump urges protesters to socially distance, wear masks
description: Ivanka Trump on Wednesday defended the right of protesters to gather in defiance of stay-at-home measures imposed by some states but encouraged demonstrators to practice social distancing and wear masks."Peaceful p...
